note.p: Birth: Baltimore, County Cork, Ireland (03 April 1821)
Death: At his residence, 54 Upper Leeson Street, Dublin, Ireland (16 October 1884)
Burial: Mount Jerome cemetery, Dublin, Ireland
Education: Trinity College, Dublin. BA (1842), MA (1852)
Career: Fellow of Trinity College, Dublin (1845); Tutor (1847); Professor of Natural History, Dublin (1870)
